student.question: Are you a student ??
student.list1: With Sourcing, you can find out which companies are hiring interns based on your criteria
student.list2: Sourcing keeps you updated on all offers that match your criteria
student.list3: With Sourcing, no need for manual follow-ups—just schedule your reminders and we’ll handle it for you
student.list4: Do you prefer app development? System administration? With one click, you get all the companies interested in your profile
student.text1: Students currently trust Sourcing for their internship search
student.text2: Students searching on the platform have successfully found internships matching their expectations
student.text3: Universities recommend Sourcing to their students
